amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 million for enforcement of subsections (a) and (b) of section 642 of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 which prohibits localities from preventing police officers from asking or reporting immigration information to the Federal government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds for expenses necessary for enforcing subsections (a) and (b) of section 642 of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 by $1,000,000. Amendment seeks to reduce the funds available for Department of Justice - Legal Activities - Salaries and Expenses, General Legal Activities by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Mollohan demanded a separate vote on the King (IA) amendment (A034).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 267).
